item.title: How do you get a server to say
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

The server name, player amount, Admin’s name, ect. at the top of the screen? I’ve tried several methods and none of em seem to work…

The one below is in my server but it doesn’t say the shit at the top of the screen:

Right after public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
it says this:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("", 13589); sendFrame126("", 13590); sendFrame126("BarteloScape", 13591); sendFrame126("Owner - Odimaru", 13592); sendFrame126("Hope you enjoy my server!", 13593); sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13594); setInterfaceWalkable(13588); }

Like I said, it’s in my server yet it doesn’t say that ANYWHERE in the server at all. Can someone help me?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a server to say
